content.description: Climbs in the Phelix Creek area. There is a beautifully constructed VOC hut - the Brian Waddington Hut - which can be used as a base camp. There are a number of LOTR themed mountains nearby that offer excellent scrambling and quality climbing. Please respect the hut and its regulations. It is first come first serve, however an online system is available through the website to indicate your intent to stay at the hut.  ubc-voc.com/wiki/Brian_Waddâ€¦. It is recommended to bring a tent during peak season. Please also be aware of bear activity from mid August to mid October. Use of the area is discouraged during this time.
